name: Gianindra Charitable Society

address: Village- Kutubpur Kothi, PO- Thathan Buzarg

briefDescription: A small Dream seen for Development and Empowering the peoples of India by Mr. Gyaneshwar Singh, President comes true on 25th Jan 2012 by registering Gianindra Charitable Society (Reg. No. MAH-148/12(N)).It works for development of Underprivileged children, their education, lives and support local community in their welfare. Gianindra is complete independent with no religious, political or government affiliation . Present Project- GyanbhavanObjectiveTo prepare and train rural underprivileged children to compete urban children in all manners.Key AreasThree Major and appreciation courses will be prepared and launched in following themes for Rural part of Bihar;Basic English Teaching upto Standard VIII.Computer Learning,Development House.
